pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 25, 2016:

Monrovia, Liberia

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart Monrovia, Liberia.

Note for media:

  • Closed to media


Antananarivo, Madagascar

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Ivato International Airport, Antananarivo, Republic of Madagascar

Ivato International Airport
Antananarivo, Republic of Madagascar

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
